items.title: 'My father should die in prison' - daughter of Dominique Pelicot in exclusive interview
items.description: Caroline Darian has become a vocal advocate for victims of sexual violence in the wake of her mother's trial.

items.title: Two pearls, a saw, a toy - this is what the survivors of LA fires went back for
items.description: Residents of LA's Altadena neighbourhood are picking through the rubble after fires destroyed their homes.

items.title: When Carter met Kim - and stopped a nuclear war
items.description: The former US president halted a US-North Korea showdown, but was also accused of going rogue.

items.title: Prince Harry and Meghan hug residents in Pasadena
items.description: The couple live near Santa Barbara in the town of Montecito.

items.title: US and UK toughen sanctions on Russian oil industry
items.description: The actions are aimed at cutting off revenue Moscow is using to fund its war in Ukraine.
